taxi.resource

Class EditAccountResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • taxi.resource.AbstractResource
      • taxi.resource.EditAccountResource

  • @Path(value="/editaccount")
public class EditAccountResource
extends AbstractResource
    EditAccountResource class implements the REST service for EditAccountService The base path for this class is /editaccount
    Since:
    Academic Year 2016-2017
    Author:
    Team 4

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response customerAddress(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerAddress method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerAddress/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his address This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response customerCreditCard(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerCreditCard method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerCreditCard/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his credit card's info This method receives as input JSON (includes the new credit card).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response customerEmail(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerEmail method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerEmail/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his email This method receives as input JSON (includes the new email).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response taxiDriverAddress(TaxiDriverInfo taxiDriverInfo, long taxiDriverId)
      taxiDriverAddress method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverAddress/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his address This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address).

      taxiDriverCreditCard method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverCreditCard/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his credit card's info This method receives as input JSON (includes the new credit card).

      taxiDriverEmail method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverEmail/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his email This method receives as input JSON (includes the new email).

    • Method Detail

      • customerAddress

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/CustomerAddress/{customerId:[0-9]+}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response customerAddress(CustomerInfo customerInfo,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                                   long customerId)
        customerAddress method

        receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerAddress/x

        where x = numeric customer ID

        It is called when a customer needs to change his address

        This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address). This JSON is transformed to CustomerInfo object. It also receives as path parameter the customer ID (long)

        The address of the user is changed via calling the service changeAddress with the appropriate inputs. This call will return the object of the Customer changed. If the change was successful, the response is 200, or else 406.

        Parameters:
        customerInfo - type CustomerInfo
        customerId - type long
        Returns:
        Response

      • customerCreditCard

        @PUT
 @Path(value="CustomerCreditCard/{customerId:[0-9]+}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response customerCreditCard(CustomerInfo customerInfo,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                                        long customerId)
        customerCreditCard method

        receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerCreditCard/x

        where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his credit card's info

        This method receives as input JSON (includes the new credit card). This JSON is transformed to CustomerInfo object. It also receives as path parameter the customer ID (long)

        The credit card of the user is changed via calling the service changeCreditCard with the appropriate inputs. This call will return the object of the Customer changed. If the change was successful, the response is 200, or else 406.

        Parameters:
        customerInfo - type CustomerInfo
        customerId - type long
        Returns:
        Response

      • taxiDriverAddress

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/TaxiDriverAddress/{taxiDriverId:[0-9]+}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response taxiDriverAddress(TaxiDriverInfo taxiDriverInfo,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="taxiDriverId")
                                                                                                                                                         long taxiDriverId)
        taxiDriverAddress method

        receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverAddress/x

        where x = numeric taxi driver ID

        It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his address

        This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address). This JSON is transformed to TaxiDriverInfo object. It also receives as path parameter the taxi driver ID (long)

        The address of the user is changed via calling the service changeAddress with the appropriate inputs. This call will return the object of the TaxiDriver changed. If the change was successful, the response is 200, or else 406.

        Parameters:
        taxiDriverInfo - type TaxiDriverInfo
        taxiDriverId - type long
        Returns:
        Response
